entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0167.10100] In the statement 003 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Income (Loss) and Comprehensive Income (Loss) the filer has defined multiple roots calculation elements that do not have a valid calculation tree defined. The root element NetIncomeLoss has sibling root elements of us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss, us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax, us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense in the filing. The sibling element us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss, us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense should appear as a calculation descendant of NetIncomeLoss. This sibling element(s) are defined as calculation descendants in the US GAAP taxonomy.
Rule Element Id:10100 Rule version: 23.0.0RC1 -
